definition: incantation/magic spell/curse/malediction/to revile/to put a curse on sb

sentences.english: The shortest mantra of this world is the name of a person.
sentences.chinese: 世上最短的咒文，是一个人的名字。

sentences.english: It's a holy ceremony, it's done just like this in front of chanting priests.
sentences.chinese: 这是神圣的仪式，在吟颂咒咒文的法师跟前就这样做。

sentences.english: It's a holy cerony, it's done just like this in front of chanting priests.
sentences.chinese: 这是神圣的仪式，在吟颂咒咒文的法师跟前就这样做。

definition: to chant a magic spell/to recite incantations
to read out/to recite/to remember sb (while talking about sth else)
abstruse/profound mystery/the mysteries of the universe
incantation/magic spell/curse/malediction/to revile/to put a curse on sb
to implement the law/to perform sorcery
(Taoism) talisman in the form of a painting of symbols thought to have magical powers
true statement/incantation (translates Sanskrit: dharani 陀羅尼|陀罗尼)
